hausaAlphabets.pronounciationExample: short 'a' as in rat, long 'a' as in father.
short 'e' as in get, long 'a' as in that
short 'i' as in hit, long 'e' as in elephant
short 'o' as in hot, long 'o' as in tool
flapped r' as in Scots English
flapped r' or 'trilled r' as as in Scots English
short 'u' as in put, long 'oo' as in look

hausaNames.name: adamu
hausaNames.meaning: adam

hausaNames.name: adare
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at night.

hausaNames.name: agada
hausaNames.meaning: Brother or sister of twins.

hausaNames.name: ali
hausaNames.meaning: excellent or noble

hausaNames.name: aminu
hausaNames.meaning: reliable and trustworthy person

hausaNames.name: amir
hausaNames.meaning: ruler, prince or commander

hausaNames.name: anaruwa
hausaNames.meaning: water bearer

hausaNames.name: ango
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born during a marriage ceremony in a household or family.

hausaNames.name: auta
hausaNames.meaning: last born in a family

hausaNames.name: arzika
hausaNames.meaning: A male child whose mother undergoes severe child labour before he was eventually given to birth.

hausaNames.name: babba
hausaNames.meaning: A big-brother to one or elder brother.

hausaNames.name: baki
hausaNames.meaning: One who is black in complexion.

hausaNames.name: bako
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born after the arrival of visitors in a household.

hausaNames.name: bakwai
hausaNames.meaning: A seventh male child in a family.

hausaNames.name: babangida
hausaNames.meaning: This name is given to a child who bears the same name with his grandfather in a family and because in-laws are shy to directly call the child by his normal name, they nickname him Babangida, master of the household.

hausaNames.name: bara
hausaNames.meaning: A first male child who was born after his siblings are all females. Bara in Hausa means to beg i.e they begged him out.

hausaNames.name: balarabe
hausaNames.meaning: male child born on wednesday

hausaNames.name: barau
hausaNames.meaning: A remaining son who was born after his successors are dying.

hausaNames.name: bashir
hausaNames.meaning: someone who brings good news

hausaNames.name: bawa
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was brought up by another woman, that was not his mother.

hausaNames.name: bilal
hausaNames.meaning: a companion of the prophet

hausaNames.name: dadba
hausaNames.meaning: A son who was born of relative couples.

hausaNames.name: danasabe
hausaNames.meaning: child born on saturday

hausaNames.name: dangali
hausaNames.meaning: An only son in a family.

hausaNames.name: danjuma
hausaNames.meaning: male child born on friday

hausaNames.name: danladi
hausaNames.meaning: male child born on Sunday

hausaNames.name: danlami
hausaNames.meaning: male child born on Thursday

hausaNames.name: daran
hausaNames.meaning: born at night, small and great

hausaNames.name: dare
hausaNames.meaning: means born at night, small and great

hausaNames.name: daren
hausaNames.meaning: means born at night, small and great

hausaNames.name: Ɗari
hausaNames.meaning: One who was born during the excess cold.

hausaNames.name: ‘Dari
hausaNames.meaning: One who was born during the excess cold.

hausaNames.name: dawo
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born when his mother was pounding millet delicacy used in preparing Hura.

hausaNames.name: dawi
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born in a season when his father harvested plentiful bundles of Guinea-corn.

hausaNames.name: dandawo
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born when his mother was pounding millet delicacy used in preparing Hura.

hausaNames.name: duna
hausaNames.meaning: One who is black in complexion.

hausaNames.name: fari
hausaNames.meaning: A person who was fair in complexion.

hausaNames.name: faruq
hausaNames.meaning: the distinguisher of truth from falsehood

hausaNames.name: faisal
hausaNames.meaning: decisive

hausaNames.name: fuad
hausaNames.meaning: heart

hausaNames.name: gaddo
hausaNames.meaning: means inheritor

hausaNames.name: gambo
hausaNames.meaning: a child after twins

hausaNames.name: gerau
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born in a season when his father harvested abundant bundles of Millet stalks.

hausaNames.name: gowon
hausaNames.meaning: rainmaker

hausaNames.name: guntau
hausaNames.meaning: short man

hausaNames.name: hankurau
hausaNames.meaning: A husband who was extremely patient in a community.

hausaNames.name: hassan
hausaNames.meaning: means good, beautiful, beautifier

hausaNames.name: hussain
hausaNames.meaning: first boy in a set of twins

hausaNames.name: hussain
hausaNames.meaning: second boy in a set of twins

hausaNames.name: habib
hausaNames.meaning: beloved

hausaNames.name: hadi
hausaNames.meaning: calm person

hausaNames.name: hafiz
hausaNames.meaning: a guardian or protector

hausaNames.name: hamzah
hausaNames.meaning: lion

hausaNames.name: hana
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born in a family while they are mourning the death of a family member.

hausaNames.name: hantsi
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at dawn.

hausaNames.name: hwari
hausaNames.meaning: A person who was fair in complexion.

hausaNames.name: imam
hausaNames.meaning: leader

hausaNames.name: isa
hausaNames.meaning: Jesus

hausaNames.name: ismaila
hausaNames.meaning: Ishmael

hausaNames.name: jalil
hausaNames.meaning: exalted

hausaNames.name: jamal
hausaNames.meaning: beauty and grace

hausaNames.name: jariri
hausaNames.meaning: One who was extremely thin at the time of birth.

hausaNames.name: jatau
hausaNames.meaning: A person who was fair in complexion.

hausaNames.name: jibril
hausaNames.meaning: archangel

hausaNames.name: jigo
hausaNames.meaning: Leader. An only son born in the midst of sisters, so he is their leader.

hausaNames.name: jika
hausaNames.meaning: Grandson to a person. A person who bore someone's grandchild name.

hausaNames.name: Kadaɗe
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born after his parents have been baren for years before he was eventually born.

hausaNames.name: Kadad’e
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born after his parents have been baren for years before he was eventually born.

hausaNames.name: kaka
hausaNames.meaning: A person who bore someone's grandparents names.

hausaNames.name: kane
hausaNames.meaning: Younger brother to one.

hausaNames.name: karami
hausaNames.meaning: thin man or younger one.

hausaNames.name: kasu
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at the market or on market day.

hausaNames.name: kasuwa
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at the market or on market day.

hausaNames.name: kokari
hausaNames.meaning: A person who was hardworking in a community.

hausaNames.name: korau
hausaNames.meaning: One who was born when his mother was divorced.

hausaNames.name: kulau
hausaNames.meaning: A most loved male child in a family.

hausaNames.name: madugu
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born during travel or born in the process of travelling.

hausaNames.name: makau
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born when it was raining cat and dog in a community.

hausaNames.name: makao
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born when it was raining cat and dog in a community.

hausaNames.name: maidawa
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born in a season when his father harvested plentiful bundles of Guinea-corn.

hausaNames.name: maifari
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born during the drought season.

hausaNames.name: maihwari
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born during the drought season.

hausaNames.name: maigero
hausaNames.meaning: - A male child who was born in a season when his father harvested abundant bundles of Millet stalks.

hausaNames.name: maikasuwa
hausaNames.meaning: a trader or a merchant

hausaNames.name: maikudi
hausaNames.meaning: a rich one or wealthy

hausaNames.name: mailafiya
hausaNames.meaning: A person who is calm and easygoing with people in a community.

hausaNames.name: mailahiya
hausaNames.meaning: A person who is calm and easygoing with people in a community.

hausaNames.name: maiwake
hausaNames.meaning: - A male child who was born in a season when his father harvested a lot of beans.

hausaNames.name: nagoma
hausaNames.meaning: A tenth male child in a family.

hausaNames.name: nagona
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at the farm.

hausaNames.name: nahantsi
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at dawn.

hausaNames.name: nanoma
hausaNames.meaning: A male child who was born at the farm.

hausaNames.name: nomau
hausaNames.meaning: A male who was born during the farming season.

hausaNames.name: rago
hausaNames.meaning: ram

hausaNames.name: rashidi
hausaNames.meaning: means rightly guided, of true faith, mature

hausaNames.name: ruwa
hausaNames.meaning: water bearer

hausaNames.name: sarki
hausaNames.meaning: One who has King name. A male child who bore kings name in a kingdom.

hausaNames.name: shekarau
hausaNames.meaning: A baby who make a year in his mother's womb.

hausaNames.name: shibkau
hausaNames.meaning: A male who was born during the sowing season.

hausaNames.name: tahir
hausaNames.meaning: pure

hausaNames.name: taminu
hausaNames.meaning: means boy born on Litinnin or Monday

hausaNames.name: tanko
hausaNames.meaning: A brother to female children in a family.

hausaNames.name: tawaye
hausaNames.meaning: brother to twins

hausaNames.name: tunau
hausaNames.meaning: Can be called Tuni meaning remembering birth. A male child who was born after his mother took a long time before she conceived another pregnancy.

hausaNames.name: umar
hausaNames.meaning: lifetime

hausaNames.name: usman
hausaNames.meaning: companion

hausaNames.name: yakubu
hausaNames.meaning: Jacob

hausaNames.name: yarima
hausaNames.meaning: Prince. A male child who bore a respected prince name in a kingdom.

hausaNames.name: yohance
hausaNames.meaning: means Yahweh is gracious, Yahweh is merciful

hausaNames.name: yohanna
hausaNames.meaning: john

hausaNames.name: yusuf
hausaNames.meaning: joseph
